interpretation:
Opener has 13-21 points
Usually promises 4+ diamonds with exception of a 4-4-3-2 hand.
Denies 5 card major. Denies ability to open 1NT.

hints.hint1:
Support: 4+ diamonds
Bid higher of 2 5 card suits
Bid lower of 2 4 card suits
2 over 1 suit must be lower than opening suit
Inverted Minor:	6-10: 3
		11-12: 2
hints.hint2:
<6 pts: Pass
4 card major:
	Major 5+5: 1S
	Majors 4+4: 1H
4 card support
	6-9 pts: raise
	10-11 pts: jump
	12+: new suit
10+ pts
	Unbid stoppers
		16-18 pts: 3NT
		13-15 pts: 2NT
	5+5: higher
	4+4: lower
	Longest
4+D over 1C: 1D
1NT
